Changelog
=========

1.0.0
-----
    - First working version.
    - Four working scrappers: ben.cz, grada.cz, cpress.cz and zonerpress.cz.
    - Two filter: duplication and aleph filter.
    - Autoparser.
    - Full documentation.
    - Unittest coverage (105 tests).

0.1.0
-----
    - Project created.
